DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / QUARTERFINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; STUNNED IN ANY LANGUAGE
DOC.TEXT: Swedish midfielder Kennet Andersson , on his team ' s advance to the semifinals against Brazil : " It ' s kind of a dream.I can ' t explain it in English . I don ' t think I can explain it in Swedish , either. " But Sweden ' s Coach Tommy Svensson is , like most of his players , remarkably calm . Even as his team seemed to be_on the verge of elimination Sunday , he said he didn ' t get too excited . " You keep hope sometimes and desperation other times , " he said . " When we were one goal down and lost a player , it seemed difficult. " JULIE CART
